strings.Value: [Search for way to unlock the door]

{n}A massive stone door blocks the entrance. It has no knobs, buttons, or other signs as to how to unlock it. However, a thick patch of moss has been scraped off the door's hinges, hinting that it's been opened recently.{/n}
{n}You barely scratch the door. You may as well have tried forcing your way through the rock face around it.{/n}
{n}You can't find any physical mechanisms. It seems the door must be opened through some magical means.{/n}
{n}The door radiates a faint transmutation aura.{/n}
{n}Without a sound, the door slides to the side, revealing the passage beyond.{/n}
